data.Name: Chase Atlantic
data.Bio: The band consists of Clinton Cave, Mitchel Cave and Christian Anthony. Mitchel and his brother Clinton previously made YouTube music videos reaching an audience of over 21 million people. The band currently has a following of over 200,000 people worldwide. The band currently write, produce and perform all of their music, which is an alternative approach to modern pop and rock. Brothers Mitchel and Clinton are able to combine their production skills and techniques to further develop the bands unique sound and style. Read more on Last.fm
